attributes.action: stop local councils from keeping houses back for immigrants when people here need them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i was recently told by liverpool city council that i would wait years for a council house as i need a four bedroomed house, as at this time the only four bed houses they had were being saved for immigrants with large families.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
